org.apache.log4j.chainsaw
Interface EventDetailFormatter

public interface EventDetailFormatter

When a particular event row has been selected in a Chainsaw LogPanel, then the formatting of the detail of the event is delegated to the registered EventDetailFormatter instance.

Author:
Paul Smith

Method Summary
 void format(JTextComponent component, LoggingEvent event)
          This formatting instance is given an opportunity to take the LoggingEvent, format it, and configure the JTextComponent with the formatted details.
 

Method Detail

format

public void format(JTextComponent component,
                   LoggingEvent event)
This formatting instance is given an opportunity to take the LoggingEvent, format it, and configure the JTextComponent with the formatted details. This method is guaranteed to be invoked by Swing's Event Dispatching thread. Implementations MUST be thread-safe. Implementations should ensure that the TextComponent is configured correctly regarding Content types etc, and should make no guarantees as to the current configuration of the JTextComponent. In particular implementations should not make any assumptions about the JTextComponent between calls, Chainsaw makes no guarantee that the same component will be passed in each time. This allows other JTextComponents to be used as requested by the user etc.

Parameters:
component - the component that should receive the formatted details of the event
event - the event object whose information should be formatted and displayed in the JTextComponent
